attributes.action: outlaw the production of kosher and halal meat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How is it, in a country where one can be arrested for mistreating a pet, that religious despots are still allowed to kill animals in the most inhumane fashion possible purely because they insist that it is "in their religion"?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
